testcase.brief: Unit Test 0102: Wireless clients connected to wifi0/wifi1 should be able to access Internet via AP.
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: After WANAddressing_UnitTest_ConfigCLI_1
Test Procedure: config Wifi SSID on AP. CLI commands: ssid test interface wifi1 ssid test save config

step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${br1.vlan1}" -v "ssid ${conn1.ssid}" -v "security-object ${conn1.ssid}" -v "ssid ${conn1.ssid} security-object ${conn1.ssid}" -v "security-object ${conn1.ssid} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "user-profile fw11 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${conn1.ssid}" -v "dns server-ip ${pub.dns1.ip}"
-v "_ff dst-ip ${pub.dns1.ip} protocol 1 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log all"

step.log-match: -b "(?i)\(o\) wifi0.1 ${pub.dns1.ip}->${br1.sta1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-reply" -ps p "(?i)\(i\) mgt0 ${pub.dns1.ip}->${br1.sta1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-reply" p "(?i)\(i\) eth0 ${pub.dns1.ip}->${br1.br.wan.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-reply" p "(?i)\(o\) eth0 ${br1.br.wan.ip}->${pub.dns1.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) mtu\(1500\) icmp-echo-req" p "(?i)\(u\) mgt0 ${br1.sta1.tif.ip}->${pub.dns1.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" p "(?i)ip forward: ip pkt with dst-ip ${pub.dns1.ip} received on wifi0.1" -e "\(i\) wifi0.1 ${br1.sta1.tif.ip}->${pub.dns1.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
